name: Accelerated Recovery
special_raw: Recover more quickly during an 8-hour rest

name: Adaptive Casting
special_raw: Select three additional spells known; cast one of them once a day

name: Adaptive Fighting
special_raw: Once per day as a move action, gain the benefit of a combat feat you don’t have

name: Adaptive Upgrade
special_raw: Temporarily create low-level armor upgrades

name: Add Leverage
special_raw: Grip your weapon with more hands to move foes farther with combat maneuvers

name: Advance Warning
special_raw: Shout a warning to your allies, causing them to stop being flat-footed

name: Advanced Melee Weapon Proficiency
special_raw: No penalty to attacks with advanced melee weapons

name: Agile Casting
prerequisite_raw: Key ability score 15, Dex 15, Mobility, caster level 4th
special_raw: Cast a spell at any point during movement

name: All Hands on Deck
special_raw: Many hands make light work

name: Ambuscade
special_raw: When you make an attack in the surprise round against a target that has not yet acted, gain a bonus to attacks and damage

name: Ambush Awareness
special_raw: If you fail the Perception check to act in the surprise round, you can still take a full defense action

name: Amplified Glitch
special_raw: Disrupt devices, causing targets to become shaken for 1 round or more

name: Antagonize
special_raw: Anger a foe, causing it to become off-target and take a -2 penalty to skill checks for 1 round or more

name: Arm Extensions
prerequisite_raw: Constructed racial trait or construct type
special_raw: You have special devices installed into your arms that allow you to extend them great distances

prerequisites.raw: Constructed racial trait or construct type

name: Barricade
special_raw: Create your own fragile cover

name: Basic Melee Weapon Proficiency
special_raw: No penalty to attacks with basic melee weapons

name: Blind-Fight
special_raw: Reroll miss chances from concealment

name: Blood in Their Eyes
special_raw: Your critical hits with slashing attacks make foes dazzled

name: Bodyguard
special_raw: Add a +2 bonus to an adjacent ally’s AC as a reaction

name: Cleave
special_raw: Make an additional melee attack if the first one hits

name: Climbing Master
special_raw: Gain a climb speed equal to your base speed

name: Close Combat
special_raw: Gain a +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks when are are in melee combat

name: Combat Casting
special_raw: +2 bonus to AC and saves against attacks of opportunity when casting spells

name: Connection Inkling
prerequisite_raw: Wis 15, character level 5th, no levels in mystic
special_raw: Gain the ability to cast minor mystic spells

name: Constant Alert
special_raw: Reroll your initiative check and automatically win ties

name: Cook Grenade
special_raw: Time your release of a grenade to increase its effectiveness

name: Coordinated Shot
special_raw: Allies gain a +1 bonus to ranged attacks against foes you threaten

name: Corruption’s Gift
special_raw: You have embraced your corruption.

name: Cosmic Truth
special_raw: Reveal a cosmic truth that makes one target who fails a Will save confused for 1d4 rounds

name: Craven Ploy
special_raw: When the going gets tough, you hide behind allies.

name: Deadly Aim
special_raw: Take a −2 penalty to weapon attacks to deal extra damage

name: Deadly Boast
special_raw: Make an attack or effect sound so impressive that foes have a harder time defending against it

name: Defensive Roll
special_raw: Attempt an Acrobatics check in place of a Reflex save or to dodge an attack

name: Deflect Projectiles
special_raw: Spend 1 Resolve Point to attempt to avoid a ranged attack

name: Diehard
special_raw: You can spend Resolve Points to stabilize and to stay in the fight in the same round

name: Dire Straits
special_raw: Stabilize when you have no Hit Points or Resolve Points left

name: Disease Adaptation
special_raw: +2 enhancement bonus to saves against disease

name: Disease Rejection
special_raw: Recover from diseases much more swiftly

name: Dispelling Strike
special_raw: Spend 1 Resolve Point to make a melee attack act as dispel magic

name: Dive for Cover
special_raw: Fall prone in an adjacent square to roll a Reflex save twice

name: Diverse Conditioning
prerequisite_raw: Eternal hope or ecstatic joy racial trait, character level 5th
special_raw: Your broad experience has made you better at avoiding danger

name: Diversion
special_raw: Use Bluff to create a distraction so that your allies can hide

name: Divine Blessing
prerequisite_raw: Worship a deity of an alignment within one step of your own alignment
special_raw: Gain a boon from your patron deity

prerequisites.raw: Worship a deity of an alignment within one step of your own alignment

name: Double Draw
special_raw: Your limbs allow you to manipulate multiple weapons

name: Double Tap

special_raw: Expend double the normal ammunition to gain bonuses to attack and damage with a small arm

name: Drag Down
special_raw: When you are tripped, you can attempt to trip an adjacent foe

name: Echolocation Attack
special_raw: Use the echo of sonic attacks to better sense your surroundings

name: Enhanced Communalism

name: Enhanced Resistance
special_raw: Gain damage reduction or energy resistance

name: Environmental Adaptation
special_raw: Gain immunity to a number of environmental and weather effects

name: Extended Telepathy
special_raw: Increase the range of your telepathy

name: Extra Resolve
special_raw: Gain 2 additional Resolve Points

name: Far Shot
special_raw: Reduce penalty due to range increments

name: Fast Talk
special_raw: Baffle a potential foe, causing it to be surprised when combat begins

name: Fleet
special_raw: Increase your base speed

name: Focused Sense
special_raw: Temporarily gain blindsight with a limited range

name: Focused Spellcaster

special_raw: Intimidate your foes when you inject them

name: Grab Attention

name: Grappler Pull
special_raw: Use a grappler to draw your foes closer to you

name: Great Cleave
special_raw: Make an additional melee attack after each melee attack that hits

special_raw: +2 bonus to Fortitude saves

special_raw: No penalty to attack rolls while wearing heavy armor

special_raw: Weapons with the explode special property create difficult terrain
